replies.body: The Azir and Sivir father comics kill me everytime

That Thresh and Kalista one got me. It's like:

{{champion:412}} -but... I brought you vengeful souls.
{{champion:429}} They're asking me to kill you.
{{champion:412}} So, does that mean you like me now?
{{champion:429}} ...

> [{quoted}](name=Chilean Commie,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=Xbk47HqE,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-05-18T19:27:22.418+0000)
>
> The Azir and Sivir father comics kill me everytime

"Hello dying. I am Dad. (bloop) OASIS OF THE DAWN! Caaaw!" -{{champion:268}}
Could anyone else go for a mid-night taco right now?
You have no idea how many times my friends and I have stopped a D&D session to go out and get tacos at midnight.
HELL YEAH!
I totally would right now ! Between two game with  {{champion:99}}. Kawaii midnight full of stars :D .
I've got to say the {{champion:37}} and {{champion:119}}  series was my favorite lazuli works (series of work)
Ahaha. Well, rest assured, there'll definitely be more of that!
The get along sweater one is my favorite and it gets me every time because Bard's behind them like "I did good. I did good."

-puts hand on your shoulder- Thank you for being a long-time fan <3

{{champion:37}} x{{champion:119}}  5ever.

THESE ARE ALL AMAZING.

So I went on the tumblr.

AND I SAW MORE AMAZING.
Ehehe <3 I'm glad to hear you like my work ^^
Love the art. I never thought Sona x Draven would work, but you did a brilliant job with it. Especially the comic about how they got together.
I love your whole snapchat series between Sona and Draven, I was laughing so hard when I first saw it! Keep up the great work! Been following you on Tumblr for a long time now!
Ahaha! Great to hear I made you laugh! Thanks for being a long-time follower :3 <3

The fact that you can even make such a cute comic give me such feels and be so serious with it as well, like when Draven learns to communicate with Sona. It was touching and everything. AHHHH KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK! SO GLAD TO SEE YOU BE THE FEATURED FAN ARTIST!
you art good

So this is the artist who did the selfies of jinx, I recognize the style
Also{{champion:45}} plz

if Ashe really thinks that she has "true love" with Tryndamere, she's out of her damn mind. The dude's a barbarian. 
She's only in it for his right arm. xD

I have no idea if Lazuli is gonna see this, but I'm so proud of you for getting a fan artist feature! 
Getting me hooked on {{champion:119}} x {{champion:37}}  among all the other great little head canons going on in the Zuli-verse has to have been one of the most awesome things to have happened in my gradual addiction to League. Plus, Lazui = inspirational sweetheart of an artistic fan. 

Keep being amazing and congrats ;u; !!!
The Sona x Draven cartoons are my fav, I literally ship them now because of it :) Edit: Also LOVE Midnight Taco run skit-that's fucking gold!

That reference to frozen though...
{{champion:22}} "You can if it's true love!!"
That snapchat lol
I love looking at Lazuli's work. It's amazing! I especially like DravenxSona!{{champion:119}} {{champion:37}}

Will... Will you do comics eventually with {{champion:72}} ?
.  n  .

He's my main and favorite champion, and I still prefer his post-Shurima lore more.
Awesome comics and stuff though.
First time looking at Tumblr was to see your work.
:D

I've always shied away from animal/monster/machine champs, because I felt as though my skill level (and my patience) wasn't there yet x3
BUT! Now that I've been getting a LOT more practice with drawing and getting out of my drawing comfort zone, I'll definitely consider drawing him.

And thank you ^^
I'm so glad to see this, Zuli is my favorite league artist.
You have really awesome art work! It's awesome people like you that keep the community alive and happy! :D keep it up
Thanks ^^ <3 I'm just happy to keep the community laughing! I'll keep on doing what I do!

(Probs gonna get hated for this, but!-)She uses just a little too much blush here and there, otherwise love it. Especially the Draven{{champion:119}}  x  Sona{{champion:37}} relationship. Don't see many trying something so 'different' like that. Totally not me being a {{champion:119}}  main or anything. But yeah, do love the work and hope you keep up the silliness and awesome artwork!
i want a taco now
Aww I was hoping to see some about Kat/Cass/Talon shenanigans. The Halloween comic is the best one! xD
The {{champion:127}}  one though !!
♥ {{champion:267}}
OH MY GOD ZULI UGH I'VE BEEN FOLLOWING YOU ON TUMBLR FOR LIKE EVER UGHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH
Aaaayyyyy, thanks for being a long-time follower! <3 ^^

I know that i am really bad at certain decisions but i am sure what i am about to say and hopefully i will not regret this 
1. Make more of this stuff this is funny   i want a mid-night taco
2.  i want a mid-night taco
Gets all my support instantly for the Gorillaz cameo. ( Of course the art and comedy is very entertaining as well. Keep up the fantastic work. :D )

Best part:
{{champion:51}} I'll get my gun.
Where can I buy a GetAlongSweater for my teams? I'd like to buy about 500.
You just earned yourself a new fan, these are nothing short of adorable.
Mad respect for the Gorillaz and Nujabes poster in the back of the Soraka/Sona(?) picture
I am in love with this OTP {{champion:37}}  x {{champion:119}}  ....... Just so cute
My favourite League artist in my opinion, very {{champion:150}} ly  :D

Yup...these are enjoyable and intoxicating. Could go on and on about it, but everyone else has, so why bother?

Spent a good deal of time laughing and looking at it all. It's really enjoyable.

Love your comics!!! Started the comics 17 hours ago and thought how awesome u t would be if you were the fan artist spotlight....and here you are....which means rito can read minds....(anchor man Nautilus ?!?!) Also, CAN YOU PLEASE MAKE AN ACHORMAN NAUTILUS COMIC?!?!?!

I actually came across these comics some time ago, by randomly scrolling through LoL google images. These are just so cute. I am such a sucker for this stuff. It's fun to read what possibly happens outside the rift. Thx for bringing this up. I wanted to come back to this.
Oh my gosh!!! I've been such a huge fan of hers forever I'm so happy she got promo'd  by riot <3!!!!  Check out her OC if you haven't she's freaking adorable and literally all her comics are gold.
